name: Highway Rivals
description:
Highway Rivals Car shooting if you are fan of deadly car racing games then get ready to try this new shooting car game. This racing game bring an amazing and thrilling shooting environment on highway against rival enemies. It can be exclusive deadly revenge shooting game on your Iphone devices. Drive monster car loaded with vast arsenal of arms and enjoy the driving and shooting attacks. Shoot as much enemies as you can while racing and get the taste of death driving thrills.

Highway Rivals Car Shooting Jump into the armored car, fasten your seat belt and get ready to start your deadly journey. Ride furious cars on dangerous and incredible city highway tracks to get lifetime racing experience. This car chase game has world class bulletproof cars to drive and modern guns to shoot and it will sure to give you a major adrenaline rush. Drive the monster cars on extreme km/h with much detailed control to crash and burn your way and enjoy the adventure of car racing game in new way. It is an all-out war between you and your rivals.
Features:
• Blow up and slow down opponents with cool explosions
• Deadly cars fully loaded with lethal weapons
• Real shooting sound and other sound effects
• Multiple Camera Views for Easy Shoot to Rivals
• Very Smooth Car Control and Steer Handling
• Amazing 3D Vivid Graphics
